firstVisit.title: Welcome!
firstVisit.content: You’ve signed up successfully.  We need some time to check and approve your profile. In the meantime you can add your peers.

empty.title: No referrals
empty.content: You have not recommended any peers just yet. Recommend someone you know is looking for a job now.

pending.title: Waiting for approval
pending.content:
We have registered you and checking your profile to be approved. You can add your peers while you are waiting.
You’ve added {{size}} referrals so far.
